summary:
Principal Operations Geologist / Subsurface Team Lead with profound end to end experience in production and exploration functions in Gabon, the Sultanate of Brunei, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the Sultanate of Oman, the State of Qatar and currently in the Netherlands.

Successfully headed teams delivering and de-risking large resource portfolios and significantly enhanced the company’s data and knowledge repositories leading to large scale new developments and expansions of existing world class assets. 

Established high-performing teams surpassing business targets withstanding challenging environments. Initiated new ways of working leading to widely acknowledged, top quartile leadership scores.				

Specialties: appointed Shell Subject Matter Expert in Operations Geology, supporting global geoscience discipline function with upkeep of HSE critical procedures and annual running of Shell Graduate Program training courses. Single Subject Certificate in Project Risk Management and Project Management Qualification (PMQ) by Association for Project Management (APM).

profile_positions.description: Deliver Support to Well Delivery Teams of Wells of Significance as part of the Global Operations Geology Hypercare team based in two Centers of Excellence. We are a Resource for Well Planning and Execution and maintain and provide critical Operations Geology skills.
profile_positions.title: Principal Operations Geologist

profile_positions.description:
Onshore Project Lead
Shell Subject Matter Expert Operations Geology  - MENA region
profile_positions.title: Subsurface Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Team leader tasked to advance multi TCF tight gas fields from appraisal to development
• Project Management: mature several gas fields to commercialization from DG1 to DG4 
• Hydrocarbon Maturation: responsible for annual Reserves and cCR additions
• WRFM: accountable for production optimization via Early Production System
• Well Delivery: drive complete well life cycle, from well picks to AAR, manage HSE and performance 
• Studies and Technology: commission and execute studies and technology trials in aid of cost reductions and EUR/well improvements
profile_positions.title: Development Planning Team Leader - Tight Gas

profile_positions.description:
• Team leader of integrated exploration and petroleum engineering team tasked to safely and efficiently drill and test unconventional and tight gas wells
• Responsible for the timely delivery of drilling, completion, fraccing and testing programmes
• Evaluate and provide strategy for basin-centre gas (BCG) programme
• Coordination of technology trials and studies in support of hydraulic fracturing strategy
profile_positions.title: Unconventional and Tight Gas Well Delivery Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
South Rub Al-Khali Company Limited (Exploration JV Shell-Aramco)

• Team leader of 4 wellsite geologists and 2 office-based drilling performance engineers 
• Contract holder mud logging, coring and core analysis 
• Coordination of exploration well proposals, end of well reports and after action reviews 
• Preparation of coring, core analysis, logging and sampling programmes 
• Custodian of all cores, core plugs and cutting samples 
• Regular well site visits for coring operations and HSE audits 
• Drilling - Evaluation departments liaison 
• Focal Point for communications to Ministry and KFUPM University 
• Well data management (incl. real-time data, daily and weekly reports)
profile_positions.title: Operations Geologist

company.name: Brunei Shell Petroleum Co. Sdn. Bhd.

profile_positions.company: Brunei Shell Petroleum Co. Sdn. Bhd.
profile_positions.description:
Production Geologist for Champion East and Champion Studies Team

• Member of Champion water-injection project team (modelled injector-producer pairs) 
• Delivered Petrel Models for Champion East field (correlations, properties, well planning, volumes) 
• Issued Field Development Plan and Well Data Packs 
• Managed external Seismic Interpretation Project and Geomechanical Study 
• Member of Integrated Modelling Review panel 
• Mentoring of junior geologists and technical assistants
profile_positions.title: Production Geologist

profile_positions.description:
Production Geologist in Well Engineering Team and Development and Opportunities Team

• Coordination of 30+ well proposals (Rabi and Gamba/Ivinga fields), mainly horizontal infill wells, some multi-laterals, some near-field appraisal
• Static modelling (established CPS-Petrel-Monarch routine) 
• Selection of wells and zones to work-over/shut-in 
• IT focal point for department
profile_positions.title: Production Geologist
